SageFirestorm-ABORT?

::he does a blackflip and lands then hits jets and flys up,he starts 
to fly but not before pulling a few more laser shots on the base,he 
notices something on his arm,a panel had slid up but no wires 
showed,there was also a panel like this on the other arm,with the 
panel retracted all that was left of the armor extension was a bar on 
the end of his arm,he grabbed the bar and flipped it out to reveal 
the armor which covered his hand and revealed his true arms::

Sagefirestorm-Sweet,steel knuckles

::but thier was more to this then would seem when he went for a fake 
puch a sword flew out,it was attached,when he brought the arm back it 
retracted into his "sleve",he pushed the bar he was gripping to get 
his new toys back up and reflipped the armor and thier was his 
hands,and before him he saw changeling::

Changeling-ok,how did it go

Sagefirestorm-we had to abort

::he said sliding back up the "panels" and flying::
